conversations.body_text: Hi chris knoch,      We apologize for the delay. The Pro X Ultra is currently out of stock at our US warehouse and will be restocked on the 30th. To avoid import taxes, we will ship your order via express delivery once it arrives at our overseas warehouse, with an estimated delivery time of approximately 3 days.

Great! Thanks for the fast reply!
